title: NA Server Unplayable - Lots of Lag - Lots of people have confirmed

embed.description: My speedtest is perfect, but ping 300, what gives?? Edit: Didnt get loss prevented, tons of people having this same issue, what gives riot!??!

body:
NA is unplayable for a lot of players right now. Lag, DC's, and unable to join games. I lost a ranked game because of this just now - ping was 300-450 the whole game with constant DC's.

I did not get loss forgiven. Any chance of getting loss forgiven for that match?

Edit: My speedtest.net results are perfect as can be - 100mbit down and 40mbit up, crystal clear. This is a league-only issue.

replies.body: my problem is ping stays fine but all of a sudden people are moving, cant see any abilities, health bars start moving from champs taking damage and then all of a sudden everything snaps back all abilities go off and its fine for a few mins. from michigan using charter. and its not just isp becasue i had the same problem using speed connect also. been doing this for awhile now.

From reading the comments, it seems that this issue was caused by an ISP problem in Florida.  Are you located in Florida by any chance?

If not, are you the only player in the game seemingly experiencing these issues when you play?

With a bit more information, I should be able to help out!
Not in Florida. Faced same issue.

From PA and I'm experiencing sudden spikes of 100 to 500 suddenly. I did the Outbound Rule trick and it worked for a bit but it made the hp bar turn black and the fps marker to disappear along with the gui for the Blue and Red buff.  After awhile the game starts spiking from 100 to 500.
How can you help us out? Thanks

Hello, iv also been getting lag spikes in my games for the past week, but mostly a huge amount of packet loss occurring.  I usually have 60 ping but now getting 150-8000 ping in games spiking all over the place, cant play the game anymore.

im from floirda, ISP is Bright House Networks.
Yes I'm in Florida, thanks for your reply.

Hello! I am another person experiencing NA lag and I'm from Florida! In my games I'm the only person experiencing any lag and it's usually 150-300 the whole time, and generally mostly in ranked games. Can you help me please? I've been dropping ranks like mad :(
I'm facing unplayable game spikes/lags. NA became the new EUW.
